ai.summary: Green Trail is a short, easy 2.8 km hike in the UK designed for beginners and families. The route offers a gentle walk with mild gradients and scenic country views without technical terrain.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily well-maintained paths with gentle gradients. Expect grassy tracks, compact soil, and occasional wet or muddy patches after rain; sturdy footwear recommended.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for typical UK weather; wear sturdy shoes, bring water, a light layer and a rain jacket; stay on marked paths, be mindful of seasonal day length, and check local alerts for closures.
recommended_gear: Light layer and a rain jacket
Map or offline navigation (or fully charged phone)
Phone fully charged and basic safety whistle
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer, and Autumn; winter conditions can be icy or muddy.
